data.title: 以 3 到 5 分钟描写以下主题
data.content: Why should people learn a new language? How would knowing another language benefit you? How would you use your new knowledge of this language?
data.answer: People should learn a new language to eliminate communication barriers. If I know another language, for example, French, I would be able to access French culture and make French friends more easily. This would benefit me from different dimensions, for example, looking at problems from the logic of a different cultural background, and lift my fashion taste because French is the capital of fashion and trend.
